Create videos with ease and express your style with stickers.

editorialNotes.standard: This digital notepad and PDF markup tool covers all the bases. Create notes with your keyboard or Apple Pencil: the app transforms your hand-drawn shapes into perfect ones, and can even convert your handwriting to text.
editorialNotes.short: Go paperless with ease and enjoy the handwriting recognition feature.

editorialNotes.tagline: All your favourites in one place
editorialNotes.standard: The House of Mouse presents its massive catalogue from Disney, Pixar, Marvel, Star Wars, National Geographic, and more to stream with wild abandon. And using GroupWatch, you can follow along with friends in real time.

editorialNotes.standard: It’s become our go-to way (and word) for connecting with people in other places. Featuring elegant design, reliable performance, and constantly evolving features.
editorialNotes.short: Stay connected with screen sharing and recording features for video calls.

ios.subtitle: Create a Resume, Essay or PDF

editorialNotes.standard: Create, edit, and view your documents on the go, and access them anytime from your device with this powerful wordsmithing app. Work from anywhere and let your work go everywhere you do.
editorialNotes.short: Create, edit and view your documents from your iPhone or iPad.

editorialNotes.standard: Easy to understand, quick to set up, and slick to use, you can create individual groups for your friends. Originally making its name among videogame players, these days, it’s used by everyone.
editorialNotes.short: A social network for gamers to chat in real time.

ios.subtitle: AI Note Taking and Study Help

editorialNotes.standard: We rely on this sleek, powerful notetaker to annotate documents, record lectures, sketch illustrations, and more. With built-in iCloud support, it’s perfect for keeping notes, documents and doodles up to date across devices.
editorialNotes.short: Annotate documents, record lectures, sketch illustrations and more.

editorialNotes.tagline: A fun way to learn a language
editorialNotes.standard: With its friendly approach and awesome updates, Duolingo’s long been one of our favourite apps for learning another language. Its secret: making the process genuinely fun. Engaging mini-games test your reading, writing and speaking skills, and joining a club (where you can encourage and compete with others) adds a great social element. Bonus: all those languages and games are available for free!
editorialNotes.short: Learn a new language. Join a club, chat with bots and get reminders to practice.

editorialNotes.standard: Find and pin creative ideas with this wonderfully designed app, alongside collaborative boards, built-in messaging, and other helpful features to help you visually explore what matters to you.
editorialNotes.short: Search, discover and collect wedding day ideas.

advisories: Infrequent/Mild Alcohol, Tobacco, or Drug Use or References

editorialNotes.standard: Come for the hilarious face filters and cool photo tags–stay for the fact it’s one of the best ways to share memories, maintain friendships, and stay up to date with your go-to websites.
editorialNotes.short: Share the moment.

editorialNotes.standard: You need toothpaste, golf clubs, and batteries—and you need them now. Known for its colossal shopping catalog, Amazon packs virtually all of the features and functions found on its website into this ample app, whether you’re buying gifts, tracking orders, or scanning items in a brick-and-mortar store for an online price comparison. It’s easy to navigate, intuitive, and extremely fast.
editorialNotes.short: Size up your next couch with AR product stickers

editorialNotes.tagline: Learn and play in Toca’s world
editorialNotes.standard: This brings together all the Toca Life apps, letting your beloved characters from different apps mingle in one beautiful world–a world that keeps growing with new areas to explore and characters to meet.
editorialNotes.short: Enrich your child’s imagination through creative world-building.

editorialNotes.standard: Whether you are tracking personal finances or you're a power spreadsheet user, Microsoft Excel will make compiling and visualizing data sleek and easy. Create workbooks and worksheets, use formulas and see your work in graphs with this powerful spreadsheet application.
editorialNotes.short: Create, edit and share your files from your iPhone or iPad.

Whether you are in the classroom, boardroom or home office, this tool can help you create high-quality presentations that look like they were designed by a professional.

editorialNotes.standard: Few things are more relaxing than settling down with a good colouring book—at least, until the kid we borrowed it from asks for it back. Pigment unleashes our grown-up creative energy with a surprisingly deep array of artist’s tools and tweaks. It even lets us automatically colour within the lines, giving our productions a sheen of perfection. We expect a call from the gallery any day now.
editorialNotes.short: Get cracking with colours.

editorialNotes.standard: There’s only one thing easier than visiting your local library: Bringing it to you. Simply link your library card and log in to freely access ebooks, audiobooks, and magazines.
editorialNotes.short: ‣ For readers, Libby allows you to check out books from your local library—directly on your iPad.

editorialNotes.standard: While we love watching live streams of our favourite games, there’s more than meets the eye. Try the many live animal cams–and even a whole channel dedicated to “happy little trees” painter Bob Ross.
editorialNotes.short: Broadcast, watch, chat and have fun.

editorialNotes.standard: Airbnb has totally changed the way we find places to stay. The unique service is packed with amazing spots all around the world—from cottages in France to New York City condos. Book private rooms, share homes with a host or list your own space. This full-featured app boasts thousands of rent-ready pads, intuitive filters and a beautiful design.
editorialNotes.short: Unique properties and memorable experiences for an unforgettable trip.
